name: Arvio
precedingDialogue: Greetings! My name is Arvio, but people call me Arvio The Wealthy
Why? I'm the proprietor of MineCroft Coal Mines and the wealthiest coal baron on the seven mountains
My team of Geo ...erm ...geolis ...scientists, say that this town's neighbouring mountains promises bounds of wealth'
I have a proposition for you, allow me to inspect those lands and I may consider helping out this dump *erherm* town
question: So what do you say friend? Do we have a deal?

transitions.label: There's a lot of money in coal. It's a deal!
transitions.feedback: Arvio brings his crew and begins inspecting your land

transitions.label: No deal, mining for coal will ruin the natural landscape!
transitions.feedback: Arvio leaves with a mischievous look on his face

name: Hunter Gatberg

name: Arvio
precedingDialogue: Mrs. Gatberg, our prediction was right. Your land is rich with coal.
question: Will you let us set up an coal mine? We'll pay you.

transitions.label: Yes

name: Cowboy Willy
precedingDialogue: A drought is affecting the farmlands of your town, this is affecting all of our local farmers
If this continues we might not be able to grow enough crops for the town
We need as much water as possible, you could pass a temporary law to restrict citizens' water usage to help.
question: Will you restrict the town's water usage?

transitions.label: Yes
transitions.feedback: Cowboy Willy is happy with your decision. The townspeople are slightly upset.

transitions.label: No
transitions.feedback: The townspeople did not have to restrict water usage, but you had to import some crops from nearby towns
